title: Metacognitive Teaching Method Development Workshop for Elementary Language Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Language Education Theory and Practical Teaching Experience at the Elementary Level
context.additional_context: Training program for current elementary language teachers on applying metacognitive strategies in online instruction

learning_goals: Participants can explain the design of three or more activities that apply the components of metacognitive strategies (planning, monitoring, evaluation) to language classes.
Participants can diagnose their own metacognitive level and create a customized lesson plan based on it.
Participants can analyze practical cases of metacognitive teaching methods through peer feedback and suggest improvements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
